word: God is to be glorified in us. Please read the eight chapter of second Corinthians. "This I say, He which soweth sparingly shall reap also sparingly: and he which soweth bountifully shall reap also bountifully." This is the work of the Lord. When God's people follow his directions on this point, the glory of the Lord shall be their rereward. Who will act on Bible principles, taking the word of God as their counselor?
